name: xpsimulation
description: Software Engineer class assignment where a group of 5 students were challenged to simulate a software development team operating under Extreme Programming principles, values and practices. We are using [Trello](https://trello.com/b/6JjKJzwO/molotov) as a project management tool.

scripts.start: cd molotov ; npm install ; .bin/www & cd front/ ; npm install ; npm start
